#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>

int main(){
	int test,s=0,c=0;
	long int maximum,i,c_val=0,s_val=0;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--){
		scanf("%ld\n",&maximum);
		char string[maximum];
		gets(string);
		s=0,c=0;
		c_val = 0;
		s_val = 0;
		for(i=0;i<maximum;i++){
			if(string[i] == 'C'){
				c++;
				if(c == 4){
					c_val++;
					c=0;
					s=0;
				}
				//printf("C");
			}
			else if(string[i] == 'S'){
				s++;
				if(s == 4){
					s_val++;
					c=0;
					s=0;
				}
			}
		}
		int val[4] = {0,15,30,40};
		if(s == 0 && c == 0)
			printf("%ld-%ld\n",s_val,c_val);
		else
			printf("%ld-%ld,%d-%d\n",s_val,c_val,val[s],val[c]);
	}
	return 0;
}
